page.title: 19Life in Sling
page.content: LIFE IN SLING IS MORE OR LESS THE SAME AS ANY OTHER VILLAGE.THERE ARE THE SAME LOCAL SHOPS SUCH AS FOOD SHOPS/POST OFFICES E.T.C LIFE AROUND THERE IS NEARLY THE SAME. CHILDREN FIGHTING AND LADY AND MAN GOING ABOUT THERE JOBS.MOST OF THE CHILDREN PLAY DOWN THE WOODS AND BUILD CAMPS.AT CHRISTMAS OR ANY OUTHER SPECIL DAY THE LOCAL PUB HAVE PARTIES. DURING THE DAY WHEN THE CHILDREN ARE AT SCHOOL THE ADULTS MAKE THE CHILDRENS BEDS AND START PREPARING THE TEA.LIFE IN SLING IS MUCH DIFFRENT TO LIFE IN THE CITY.YOU WOULD THINK THAT LIFE IN SLING IS A BUSY PLACE BUT IT ISNOT AS BUSY AS THE CITY. SLING IS A LOT MORE ATTRACTIVE BECAUSE YOU CAN LISTEN TO THE BAND AT SCARR,etc...
